value.title: Power BI DAX for Beginners: AVERAGE, AVERAGEA, AVERAGEX
value.excerpt: Welcome to the complete Power BI DAX Beginner Series. During this session, we will discuss the AVERAGE function in DAX. AVERAGE function in Power BI DAX has lots of variations. During this session, we will cover AVERAGE, AVERAGEA, AVERAGEX. So, Let's get started!  The Episode covers the following information:
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Xoarx0QJeZ8" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: A quick look at the new Power BI Report Builder
value.excerpt: Patrick takes a quick look at Power BI Report Builder including how to get it. This report builder is optimized for the Power BI service. Patrick calls out a few reasons this is the case.  Power BI Paginated Report Builder Now Available https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/power-bi-paginated-report-builder-now-available/
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/mEKYu-izMhg" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Bring Power BI to your every day Microsoft Teams usage
value.excerpt: Have you added the Power BI app to Microsoft Teams? Bring Power BI closer to your day to day and have your reports ready when you need them! Adam shows you how.  Announcement Blog: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/announcing-new-power-bi-experiences-in-microsoft-teams/  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/UbuGmVIOmp4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead.  Processing Options:  https://docs.microsoft.com/analysis-services/multidimensional-models/processing-options-and-settings-analysis-services?view=asallproducts-allversions
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/OYYnoMa-93g" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Configure Power BI Aggregations
value.excerpt: Learn to configure your Power BI Aggregations table to really increase the speed of your DAX queries. This does NOT require Power BI Premium!  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills to the next level? We have training courses available

value.title: Create a date range parameter with Power BI Paginated Reports
value.excerpt: How do you do a date range with the Paginated visual used with Power BI Paginated Reports? Adam shows you how to get a date range going without passing every day's value within the range.  Create and use the paginated report visual https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/visuals/paginated-report-visual

value.title: Create Power BI reports in Power BI Report Server
value.excerpt: Create Power BI reports in Power BI Report Server  In this video, I walk through the steps to create your Power BI Report in order to publish it to Power BI Report Server. This involves downloading and installing Power BI Desktop optimized for Power BI Report Server and connecting to Analysis Services

value.title: Expand lists in Power BI (also a look at M Syntax)
value.excerpt: I show how you can take a table that lists "Record" and expand that within Power BI. This also works with Power Query. I have a look at the M Syntax and show a cleaner approach. value.title: Power BI and the On-premises Data Gateway: What is it?
value.excerpt: In this video, we look at the On-Premises Data Gateway. What is it exactly? This can be used with more than just Power BI. This includes PowerApps, Microsoft Flow, Azure Analysis Services and more. The entire Power Platform!   If you found this video helpful, we have a free cheat sheet for you for more

value.title: Power BI for the NON-TECHnical person
value.excerpt: Is Power BI intimidating? Coming from Microsoft Excel? You consider yourself non-technical? Don't want to have to write or know anything about DAX? Patrick looks at how you can create a report quickly with just your Excel data and not have to write any code!  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Power BI Incremental Refresh - Understanding Detect Data Changes

Download Patrick's free cheat-sheet: https://guyinacu.be/detectdatachangescheatsheet  Incremental refresh documentation - https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-premium-incremental-refresh

value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Data source, Dataset and parameters

value.title: Power BI Secure Embed - a no code / low code option

If you have been using Publish to Web internally, you need to look at this feature as it is the perfect replacement that adds a secure option for easy, frictionless, embedding.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Power BI Tutorial: Sort By A Measure Not Shown In Visual
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Patrick shows you how you can sort by a measure not show in a visual within Power BI Desktop. This was something we didn't even know about until recently and it a great little Power BI nugget. If you wanted to sort by something not shown in a visual, this video is for you!
